message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a bit less, but still a good deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'll give you less, but you're getting desperate, I can tell!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting smart! You're going to have to do better than that!
You're getting low, I'm going to take it all!
You're getting bold, but I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a little more, but don't think you're getting away with it!
You're running out of time, and so am I. This is my best offer!
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting desperate too. But I'm not giving up yet! This is my best offer, and it's still better than yours!
You're out of time, and so am I. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're trying to squeeze me dry, but I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't think you're getting away with it!
